Package ie.gmit.dip

Interface WordParsator

All Known Subinterfaces:
ScriptParsator
All Known Implementing Classes:
IgnoreWords, WordCloud
public interface WordParsator
Role of WordParser - is to ensure text stored in a string is cleaned up of non word text\symbols and the text is split into an array of strings
Author:
Maire Murphy

      static String cleanText(String text)
